Questions.Question: In which TV show does the character Oliver Queen fight crime as the vigilante 'Green Arrow'?
Questions.Explanation: Arrow is a DC Comics series that aired from 2012 to 2020. It follows the transformation of Oliver Queen into the vigilante Green Arrow.

Questions.Question: Who plays the titular character in the Marvel TV show 'Jessica Jones'?
Questions.Explanation: Krysten Ritter portrayed Jessica Jones, a former superhero turned private investigator with superhuman strength, in the Netflix series.

Questions.Question: Which character is known as the 'Man of Steel' in the DC Comics universe?
Questions.Explanation: Superman, created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster, made his first appearance in 'Action Comics #1' in 1938, pioneering the superhero genre.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the team of teenage superheroes featured in the TV show 'Young Justice'?
Questions.Explanation: 'Young Justice' follows the adventures of the young heroes who are part of the covert operations team known as 'The Team'.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays Matt Murdock, a blind lawyer who fights crime as the vigilante 'Daredevil'?
Questions.Explanation: Charlie Cox's portrayal of Daredevil in the Netflix series received critical acclaim for its compelling performance and realistic fight sequences.

Questions.Question: Who is the arch-enemy of the Scarlet Speedster 'The Flash'?
Questions.Explanation: The Reverse-Flash, also known as Eobard Thawne, is a formidable foe and the main antagonist of The Flash in the TV series.

Questions.Question: Which actor plays the role of Barry Allen, who becomes the speedster superhero 'The Flash'?
Questions.Explanation: Grant Gustin portrays Barry Allen, who gains super-speed abilities and fights crime as the scarlet speedster 'The Flash' in The CW series.

Questions.Question: In the TV show 'Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.', which character is the director of S.H.I.E.L.D.?
Questions.Explanation: Phil Coulson, played by Clark Gregg, leads the S.H.I.E.L.D. team and serves as a central character throughout the series' seven-season run.

Questions.Question: Who is the younger cousin of Superman and a Kryptonian superhero in the TV show 'Supergirl'?
Questions.Explanation: Kara Zor-El, also known as Supergirl, is a powerful hero who protects National City while embracing her Kryptonian heritage.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features the character Jessica Hamby, a vampire trying to live a normal life in Bon Temps, Louisiana?
Questions.Explanation: 'True Blood' explores the co-existence of vampires and humans, with Jessica Hamby navigating her identity and morality in the supernatural world.

Questions.Question: Who is the billionaire playboy and owner of Queen Consolidated in the TV show 'Arrow'?
Questions.Explanation: Oliver Queen, portrayed by Stephen Amell, balances his public persona as a billionaire with his vigilante duties as the Green Arrow.

Questions.Question: Which actress portrays the character Wanda Maximoff, also known as Scarlet Witch, in the Marvel TV show 'WandaVision'?
Questions.Explanation: Elizabeth Olsen's portrayal of Wanda Maximoff delves into her grief, chaos magic, and her evolving reality-altering powers in the series 'WandaVision'.

Questions.Question: In 'Gotham', which character eventually becomes the iconic Batman?
Questions.Explanation: The TV series 'Gotham' explores Bruce Wayne's evolution from witnessing his parents' murder to his eventual transformation into the Dark Knight, Batman.

Questions.Question: Who is the main antagonist in the Marvel TV show 'Luke Cage' and the owner of Harlem's 'Paradise' club?
Questions.Explanation: Cottonmouth, portrayed by Mahershala Ali, is a charismatic but ruthless crime boss who clashes with the bulletproof hero Luke Cage.

Questions.Question: Which city does the TV show 'Daredevil' primarily take place in?
Questions.Explanation: 'Daredevil' is set in the gritty and crime-ridden streets of Hell's Kitchen, New York City, where Matt Murdock fights injustice as the vigilante Daredevil.

Questions.Question: Which actor portrays the character Danny Rand, a martial arts expert who becomes the superhero 'Iron Fist'?
Questions.Explanation: Finn Jones takes on the role of Danny Rand, who harnesses the power of the Iron Fist to battle against corruption and threats in New York City.

Questions.Question: Which character in the TV show 'Legends of Tomorrow' is a former member of the League of Assassins and wields a pair of escrima sticks?
Questions.Explanation: Sara Lance, also known as White Canary, showcases her formidable combat skills and leadership abilities as she navigates time-traveling adventures in the series.

Questions.Question: In 'Supernatural', who is the older brother and primary protagonist fighting supernatural creatures?
Questions.Explanation: Dean Winchester, portrayed by Jensen Ackles, prioritizes family and hunts demons, ghosts, and monsters alongside his brother Sam in the long-running series.

Questions.Question: Which Marvel TV show features a group of powered individuals investigating mysterious incidents and protecting the world from supernatural threats?
Questions.Explanation: 'Marvel's Runaways' follows a diverse group of teenagers as they uncover their parents' dark secrets and forge their own path as a team of Runaways.

Questions.Question: Who is the main villain in the TV show 'Jessica Jones', responsible for manipulating minds and controlling people?
Questions.Explanation: Kilgrave, also known as The Purple Man, terrorizes Jessica Jones with his mind-control abilities and obsession, making him a formidable and disturbing antagonist.
